tool.name: archive

param.name: urls
param.displayname: Text file with list of feature service URLs
param.dialogReference: Text file containing feature service URLs (one per line).

param.name: backup_folder
param.dialogReference: Folder where archive geodatabases are maintained. Geodatabases are created if they don't already exist (e.g. if it is the first time used by the tool).

param.name: old_day
param.displayname: Delete daily archive layers older than (days):
param.dialogReference: Daily backups older than this number of days are deleted.

param.name: old_month
param.displayname: Delete monthly archive layers older than (months):
param.dialogReference: Monthly backups older than this number of months are deleted.

tool.summary: Given a list of feature service URLS in a text file (one per line), and an archive folder, archives feature service layers (downloads copies of all layers). Will use existing geodatabases in the folder if they already exist, or create a new one if it doesn't exist. One-per-day and one-per-month archives are saved. Daily and monthly archives older than the specified limits are deleted.
